dcterms:description: The Autism Brain Imaging Data Exchange (ABIDE) database aggregates data from different acquisition sites and openly shares functional MRI and phenotypic data of 1112 subjects from across 20 international sites. The dataset is used for binary classification tasks in brain disorder classification.
dcterms:title: Autism Brain Imaging Data Exchange (ABIDE)
